item.title: Federal Reserve Governor Waller: "No Need to Worry" About Using Smart Contracts, Tokenization, or Distributed Ledger Technology in Everyday Transactions
item.description: August 26th. Lately, Lael Brainard, a member of the Federal Reserve Board and a prominent candidate for the next Chair of the Federal Reserve, gave a public speech on "Technological Advancements in Payments" at a blockchain seminar held in Wyoming. She emphasized that the payment system is undergoing a "technology-driven revolution." Recent advancements in computing power, data processing, and distributed networks are fueling the growth of innovative payment services.Brainard stated that three key things occur in any payment transaction. The same processes also apply to the realm of cryptocurrencies. "When I purchase a meme coin and use a stablecoin as the payment method, the transaction is carried out through a smart contract. Eventually, the transaction is recorded on a distributed ledger. This is not something to be feared as it happens in the world of decentralized finance or DeFi. It is simply a new technology used to transfer assets and record transactions. There is no need to

item.title: 65.5 billion WLFI tokens have been transferred to the Lockbox contract, representing 6.55% of the total token supply.
item.description: On August 26th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), 6.55 billion WLFI tokens have been transferred to the Lockbox contract, which makes up 6.55% of the total token supply.The team announced that the Lockbox was opened at 3:57 a.m. today. In just five and a half hours, a large number of tokens were received. At the current contract price, the estimated value is $1.5 billion. Two of the top 10 individual holders have already completed their transfers (TOP1 & TOP8).This morning's news indicated that the WLFI token will officially start unlocking at 8 a.m. Eastern Time on September 1st. The related feature page (Lockbox) is now live.

item.title: Huma Finance Announces Launch of Season 1 Airdrop
item.description: August 26th. Huma Finance declared the commencement of Season 1 airdrop in order to reward liquidity providers, HUMA stakers, ecosystem partners, and community users.The official announcement noted that since the Season 0 airdrop, the platform has accumulated approximately $6 billion in PayFi transactions.

item.title: Stargate has announced the termination of the STG staking feature. veSTG holders will share 50% of the protocol revenue, with the remaining 50% allocated to ZRO buyback.
item.description: August 26th. According to an official announcement made by Stargate, the LayerZero Foundation has officially completed the full acquisition of Stargate (STG), encompassing the protocol, token, and treasury. Following the acquisition, the STG token will be exchangeable for LayerZero's native token ZRO at a fixed rate (1 STG = 0.08634 ZRO), and the exchange window will remain open without a specific end date.Furthermore, the StargateDAO will be dissolved, and the STG staking function will be terminated. However, previously locked STG will automatically unlock, and users will be able to exchange them for ZRO at any time. Additionally, all veSTG holders who locked their tokens prior to August 10th will share 50% of the Stargate protocol's revenue over the next six months, with the remaining 50% being used for ZRO buybacks.Previously, the Stargate DAO had approved LayerZero's acquisition of Stargate (STG).

item.title: A Bitcoin Whale HODLer of 5 Years Moves 2221 BTC, Realizing a Cumulative ROI of 1265x
item.description: August 26th. As per Chainalysis, following a period of 5 years in dormancy, a dormant BTC whale made a move 5 hours ago by transferring 2,221 BTC ($245 million) to two new wallets.This whale initially amassed 3,109 BTC 12 years ago (in 2013/7) when the price of BTC was $94.5. Eight years ago (in 2017/8), it sold 888 BTC at a price of $4,540 (and transferred them to Gemini), and has been holding the remaining 2,221 BTC ever since.The BTC it accumulated has now achieved a 1265x return on investment.

item.title: Tom Lee's Fund Analyst: Ethereum to Bottom Around $4300, Then Break Above $5100
item.description: On August 26th, based on a tweet screenshot provided by Tom Lee, analyst Mark Newton, who precisely predicted last week that Ethereum would reach its bottom at $4070, stated that Ethereum has a favorable risk-reward ratio at this price. Unless the bull market trend is disrupted, Ethereum will not fall below $4067 again."It is ideal that Ethereum bottoms out near $4300, then begins to rebound, sets a new high once again, and breaks through $5100 to rise to approximately $5400 - 5450, which could be of significant importance."

item.title: 「Big Brother Whale」 Huang Lizhong Holds ETH Long Position of Over $100 Million, with Unrealized Loss of Over $6.65 Million
item.description: August 26th. Based on the monitoring of HyperInsight (https://t.me/HyperInsight), in the early morning today, "Big Brother Whale" Huang Licheng significantly increased his long positions in multiple coins. Specifically:- ETH: Added 2700 coins, with a total position size of approximately $100.5 million. Currently, it is experiencing a floating loss of about $6.65 million, and the liquidation price is around $3028.- BTC: The position size is around $29 million, with a floating loss of about $868,000.- HYPE: The position size is around $6.85 million, with a floating loss of about $293,000.- YZY: The position size is around $616,000, with a floating loss of about $15,400.- PUMP: The position size is around $53,000, with a floating loss of about $3,260.Overall, Huang Licheng increased his positions in multiple coins this time. However, currently, most positions are still in a floating loss state.

item.title: Whale Trader Engages in Dip Buying During Market Downturn, Spending $99.03 Million to Buy the Dip on 10,000 ETH and 500 BTC
item.description: On August 26th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, during the market decline, 0xd8d0, an OTC trading whale renowned for conducting swing trades, utilized 99.03 million USDC to once more purchase 10,000 ETH (valued at 43.67 million USD) and 500 BTC (valued at 54.99 million USD).

item.title: Tom Lee: ETH Expected to Bottom in the Next Few Hours
item.description: On August 26th, the board chairman of BitMine, Tom Lee, retweeted the market views of his fund analyst Mark Newton and wrote: "It is expected that ETH will reach its bottom in the next few hours."Last week, Tom Lee and his analysts accurately predicted a short-term bottom for Ethereum near $4070.

item.title: Viewpoint: The next Federal Reserve FOMC meeting will be a "sell-the-news" moment
item.description: On August 26th, the crypto analyst @IamCryptoWolf shared a market perspective, indicating that the next Federal Reserve FOMC meeting will be a "sell-the-news" event. Prior to that, the market will experience a steady upward trend.@IamCryptoWolf presented his analysis on the Tradingview platform in 2014 and has 111,000 followers on the X platform.
